title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: ESP (English for Specific Purposes) for Engineering Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level engineering background and basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Improvement of English presentation skills in engineering (evaluation criteria: content structure, technical terminology accuracy, delivery effectiveness).

Learners analyze three AI technical documents (papers, white papers, etc.), derive two critical insights (technical limitations, ethical issues, etc.) per document, present opinions once in a discussion session, and incorporate ≥2 peer feedbacks.
Strengthening English communication competencies in international collaboration scenarios (evaluated by role-play performance).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
